name: Uncomplicated Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
chief_complaint: It burns when I pee, and I feel like I have to go all the time.

lab_results.Urinalysis: Positive leukocyte esterase, nitrites, and WBCs >10/hpf

prognosis: Excellent with prompt treatment; symptoms typically resolve within 2-3 days
description: A bacterial infection of the lower urinary tract, most commonly caused by E. coli, affecting the bladder and urethra without kidney involvement.
